title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Cereal Seed)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Cereal Seed) 

(Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2022.

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 2. The European Union (Cereal Seed) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 217 of
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Cereal Seed) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 217 of 
2013) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the definition of 
“Directive” (as amended by the European Union (Cereal Seed) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 33 of 2022)) the following: 

“‘Directive’ means Council Directive 66/402/EEC of 14 June 19662 (as 
amended by Council Directive 69/60/EEC of 18 February 19693, Council 
Directive 71/162/EEC of 30 March 19714, Council Directive 72/274/EEC of 20 
July 19725, Council Directive 72/418/EEC of 6 December 19726, Council 
Directive 73/438/EEC of 11 December 19737, Council Directive 75/444/EEC 
of 26 June 19758, Council Directive 78/55/EEC of 19 December 19779, 
Council Directive 78/692/EEC of 25 July 197810, Commission Directive 
79/641/EEC of 27 June 197911, Council Directive 79/692/EEC of 24 July 
197912, Council Directive 86/155/EEC of 22 April 198613, Commission 
Directive 86/320/EEC of 20 June 198614, Commission Directive 87/120/EEC 
of 14 January 198715, Council Directive 88/380/EEC of 13 June 198816, 
Council Directive 90/654/EEC of 4 December 199017, Council Directive

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 3. The European Union (Cereal Seed) (Amendment) Regulations 2022

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2021/1927 of 5th November 2021 and make provision for the 
requirements necessary for seeds of hybrid wheat produced by means of 
cytoplasmic male sterility to be included in Annexes I and II of Council 
Directive 66/402/EEC 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [378] 5
